title: Terrell Davis is Encouraged. But Not Satisfied
itunes:title: Terrell Davis is Encouraged. But Not Satisfied
description:
Three months into a widespread, national reckoning on racial inequalities, and on the eve of pro football returning, NFL Hall of Famer Terrell Davis returns to take on all of it. And amid a wide-ranging discussion touching on systemic racism, player safety and health, the football great pauses to ruminate on Michael Barr's bowling injury -- proving once and for all why he's the show's favorite guest.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
